sub_title: VP HR Services Delivery at Technip Energies
summary:
I am an experienced HR leader with a positive, pro active and continuous improvement mindset. 

I have more than 15 years of international HR experience in various HR roles and in different countries (Netherlands, Italy, France and UK). These positions were both operational as project related in a project driven and matrix structured profit organisation. I have had roles with an end responsibility on country, regional, a global business unit level as well as for in a Corporate role for a global scope. Together with the business I have done both cost reduction programs (incl restructuring) as well as strong growth programs.

I strive for strong alignment between the vision of the organisation and the HR strategy & practices. I enjoy getting the most our of a team (HR and Management team), have a commercial mind set and a pragmatic business sense approach. I get energy from connecting people with ideas and with other people. 

Specialties: Human Resources Leadership, Experience with international HR environment, Change Management, Talent  and L&D Management, Implementation programs of HR systems, Employee Relations, Works Council management, Executive coaching, recruitment and restructuring programs, internal communications, employee wellbeing and employee engagement programs.

education.field_of_study: Executive education course, HR Strategy in Transforming Organisations
Business Administration, HRM and Small Business & Entrepreneurship

profile_positions.description:
Leading the HRSD function at TEN.
HR Service Delivery at TEN consists of 3 main pillars:
1) P&C Technology; responsible for all global and local P&C related Technology (=systems) and interfaces. Designing & delivering projects and providing operational support together with respective CoE's as well as with our IDS colleagues.  
2) P&C Data & Analytics; responsible for developing and driving the roadmap from retrospective operational reporting towards P&C Analytics which will support (business) decision making 
3) P&C Service Delivery; responsible for execution of payroll in 26 countries as well as transactional activities related to the employee lifecycle. Including 2 key projects: uniform global approach regarding PeopleBoarding as well as project which includes delivery of harmonized global processes in close collaboration with our GBS center in India
Part of the global TEN People & Culture Leadership Team.
